page.title: 18Views on Life Today
page.content: Anonymous views from{W.I. survey. "Life today is generally selfish. People are interested only in what they can get out of it and not what they can put in. Lowering of standards is responsible for{lack of discipline, {vandalism}and{crime}generally. The most important factor missing today is contentment." "House used as a "bachelor pad". Much time spent with friends. Sport features prominently. My house is usually a mess. I prefer to enjoy myself rather than clean and maintain my house. This will change (I hope!) when I get married, if ever. I love dogs but feel that my jetsetting lifestyle would be unfair to a dog. I love life and nearly always live up to my financial limits because life may be short. I have insurance for the future."
